name: Helicopter RC Simulator 3D
description:
RC Helicopter game, Helicopter RC Simulator 3D is the latest Helicopter flight simulator game where you get to fly a collection of amazing radio-controlled helicopters in the house and outside in the back yard!
Complete all 36 unique helicopter flying levels to become the best RC Helicopter pilot!

***This is the full version of HELIDROID 3***

!ALL 36 RC HELICOPTER LEVELS UNLOCKED, FLY AROUND FREELY IN SANDBOX MODE!

Helicopter RC Simulator 3D is the latest 3D radio-controlled helicopter simulation game, available now !

Fully equipped with weapons like missiles, machine guns, and loads more gear to perform special tasks throughout the levels in the Helicopter RC Simulator 3D!


FEATURES:
- Put out raging fires to rescue robots
- Scare off pesky birds by shooting missiles at them!
- Use super powerful magnets to pick ups heavy loads
- Wreck anything in you path with a industrial wrecking ball!
- Go head-to-head with other helicopters in flight combat
- Chase and scare the naughty birds that cause trouble in the house
- Perform risky and defying stunts, testing your flying skills!

Helicopter RC Simulator 3D is totally free, no "in-app purchase" ! All in-game bonuses are unlocked throughout the game, 3 helicopters ready to fly!

Helicopter RC Simulator 3D is a exciting, fun filled helicopter flying simulator game, using the latest game physics engine that let's you interact with the environment and objects in it.


Sounds exciting? If you think so, get ready to play the new RC Helicopter simulation game, Helicopter RC Simulator 3D!
